title: Parking:
description: Self-parking in the underground garage is ￡15 per day and valet-parking is ￡50 per day.

title: Airport Shuttle:
description: Our complimentary airport shuttles leave every hour on the hour, and make trips to Heathrow and Gatwick airports.

title: Trains:
description: The nearest Underground station is at Leicester Square.

title: Pet Policy:
description: Pets of all sizes and types are allowed in designated pet rooms, and the specified common areas. Service animals are allowed everywhere.
